item.title: Trump admin pressed on pardon for ex-Honduras president after Venezuela’s Maduro snatched
item.description: The U.S. captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Saturday and charged him with drug-related crimes.

item.title: Rubio explains how U.S. might 'run' Venezuela after Maduros' ouster
item.description: President Donald Trump on Saturday said the U.S. will "run" Venezuela until a new leader is determined.

item.title: 'A dangerous ​precedent': World leaders react to the U.S. attack on Venezuela
item.description: Russia and Iran broadly condemned the U.S. attack on Venezuela, while other world leaders called for de-escalation and said they are monitoring the si...

item.title: U.S. attacks Venezuela, captures Maduro and his wife; AG Bondi says charges include 'Narco-Terrorism'
item.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.

item.title: Trump's removal of Maduro prompts questions from Congress
item.description: Congressional lawmakers say they were not briefed before President Donald Trump launched a land attack on Venezuela and deposed President Nicolas Madu...
